# lavinmq_federation_upstreams (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "lavinmq_federation_upstreams" "all" {
  vhost = "/"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `vhost` (String) The vhost to list federation upstreams from. If not specified, lists all federation upstreams.

### Read-Only

- `federation_upstreams` (Attributes List) List of federation upstreams. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--federation_upstreams))

<a id="nestedatt--federation_upstreams"></a>
### Nested Schema for `federation_upstreams`

Read-Only:

- `ack_mode` (String) Acknowledgement mode.
- `consumer_tag` (String) Consumer tag for the federation link.
- `exchange` (String) Name of upstream exchange to federate from.
- `expires` (Number) Expiry time in milliseconds.
- `max_hops` (Number) Maximum number of federation hops.
- `message_ttl` (Number) Message TTL in milliseconds.
- `name` (String) Name of the federation upstream.
- `prefetch_count` (Number) Number of messages to prefetch from upstream.
- `queue` (String) Name of upstream queue to federate from.
- `reconnect_delay` (Number) Delay in seconds before reconnecting.
- `uri` (String) AMQP URI of the upstream broker.
- `vhost` (String) Virtual host where the federation upstream is defined.
